name: Poetry Postcard Subscription (3 weeks)
description:
Brighten up your week with poetry!

Subscribe today and get poetry delivered right to your mailbox!

For as long as you are subscribed, every Monday I will mail out a postcard to your address with a poem chosen & handwritten by me!

Subscription rates:

$2 for 3 postcards (3 weeks)
$3 for 4 postcards (4 weeks)
$4 for 5 postcards (5 weeks)
$5 for 6 postcards (6 weeks)

No shipping for domestic orders. International rates are included in shipping charge. Postage is $1.10 to send each postcard overseas!
